text:
I've recently listened to insightful and fun podcast episode on @InfoQ about 7 ways to fail at #microservices. I absolutely loved it!😺So many good points I can relate to - check it out: https://t.co/a6fYqukCWY
#softwarearchitecture #developmentpodcast #tech #softwaredevelopment https://t.co/WJ1r6CUUwD

author.name: Kris De
author.description: Open Sourceress. Potterhead. Cat Mom of 3 😻 Unstable Unicorn🦄 Microsoft Azure MVP⛅️ Writing about tech at: https://t.co/xzT4Dmd17m
